titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter from the Generals Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax his quarrers [sic]; concerning the armies not disbanding; the votes of the Councell of War, and the proceedings of the committees of the souldiers. With the answer to the Parliame[n]ts message of sending for the monies [b]ack again: and the proceedings of the Committee of Lords and Commons, with the army.
titleStmt.author: Smart, Roger.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Burey this 2 of Iune, 1647. Roger Smart.
Several characters on the title page have failed to print.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 3d 1647"; the second 6 in imprint date altered to "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
